value.stringValue: Cannot fill both fields 'Project Result Statement' and 'Parent Activity' on Result Based type
"Activity type is mandatory on Standard, Grant and Humanitarian projects. Please select the activity type to continue generating the activity."
Activities for type "ResultsBased" needs a Parent Activity or a Result Statement at least

assignments.name: Set_Order_Id_from_activities_with_no_Parent_Activity_and_PRS
assignments.label: Set Order Id from activities with no Parent Activity and PRS

assignments.name: Set_Order_Id_From_Project_Result_Statement
assignments.label: Set Order Id From Project Result Statement

choices.name: choice_Milestone
choices.choiceText: Milestone

decisions.description: Validation should happen when user tries to save activity on standard grant and humanitarian projects without activity type.
decisions.name: Activity_Type_is_mandatory
decisions.label: Activity Type is mandatory?

decisions.name: Check_If
decisions.label: Check If ResultBase Type Is Selected Correctly

rules.name: No
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND ((2 OR 4 OR 6) AND (3 OR 5 OR 7))
rules.label: No

decisions.name: ResultBased_Type_ParentAct_And_RS_Selected
decisions.label: ResultBased Type ParentAct And RS Selected?

Flow.description: Autofill the activity ID for parent activity or project result statement

formulas.name: fx_Activity_Name
formulas.expression: IF( {!Activity_Type_New} = {!choice_Results_Based}, IF( ISBLANK({!Parent_Activity_New_Overarching}), LEFT({!var_Result_Statement_OrderID} & "." & TEXT({!Activity_ID}) & " " & {!Activity}, 80), LEFT({!var_Parent_Activity_OrderID} & "." & TEXT({!Activity_ID}) & " " & {!Activity}, 80) ), IF( ISBLANK({!Parent_Activity_New_Overarching}), LEFT(TEXT({!Activity_ID}) & ". " & {!Activity}, 80), LEFT({!var_Parent_Activity_OrderID} & "." & TEXT({!Activity_ID}) & " " & {!Activity}, 80)) )

Flow.label: Create Project Activity

recordCreates.description: Publish a Platform Event to get the Refresh Banner/Icon to display to the User after they have created an Activity.
recordCreates.name: Trigger_Page_Refresh
recordCreates.label: Trigger Page Refresh

recordLookups.name: Get_Activity_For_Next_Order_ID
recordLookups.label: Get Activity For Next Order ID

recordLookups.name: Get_None_Related_Activities_for_Next_Id
recordLookups.label: Get None Related Activities for Next Id

recordLookups.name: Get_Project_Result_Statement_for_Next_Id
recordLookups.label: Get Project Result Statement for Next Id

screens.name: Choose_Parent_Or_Project_Result_Statement
screens.label: Choose Parent Or Project Result Statement

fields.name: Activity_Type_New
fields.helpText:
Results-based: "Activities that staff will conduct to achieve the locally defined outputs in the results framework".

Overarching: "Activities that staff will conduct to manage and monitor the project, but that do not contribute directly to a single outputâ€¯."

fields.name: Parent_Activity_New_Overarching
fields.helpText: For sub-activities, please select the related main activities (needs to be entered before). For main activities, please select "none"

fields.name: Parent_Activity_New_RB
fields.helpText: For sub-activities, please select the related main activities (needs to be entered before). For main activities, please select "none"

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR (1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5))

fields.name: label_rs
fields.fieldText: Project Result Statement: {!Result_Statement_New}

fields.name: Activity
fields.helpText: Description must be less than 80 characters. For a detailed description please use 'Description' field.

validationRule.errorMessage: Activity value is too long. Please restrict entry to less than 80 characters or less.

fields.name: Activity_ID
fields.helpText: Please provide the Order Number for this Activity - e.g. 1, 2, 3 etc.

validationRule.errorMessage: Activity ID must have between 1 o 4 digits
The Start Date of the Activity should not be after the Planned Implementation End Date of the Project.
The End Date of the Activity should not be after the Planned Implementation End Date of the Project.

fields.name: Error_Flow
fields.fieldText:
Activities of the type "Results-based" must be assigned to either a parent activity or result statement. Please check if Activity ID is duplicated. Please review your entry.


Technical details below:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: No_Activity_Schedule_Found
fields.fieldText: No Activity Schedule exists for this Project. Please enter the name for a new Activity Schedule.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure the Activity Schedule Name is 80 characters or less.

fields.name: Output_Values
fields.fieldText:
Implementation Plan: {!var_Implementation_Plan_Name}

Activity Type: {!Activity_Type_New}

Parent Activity For Overarching: {!Parent_Activity_New_Overarching}

Parent Activity For Results-Based: {!Parent_Activity_New_RB}

Project Result Statement For Results-Based: {!var_Result_Statement_Name}

Activity Name: {!fx_Activity_Name_New}

Activity ID: {!Activity_ID}

Description: {!Description}

Person Responsible: {!Person_Responsible}

Persons Involved: {!Persons_Involved}

Start Date: {!Start_Date}

End Date: {!End_Date}

Status: {!value_status_new_or_open}

Service Type: {!PTAsForm}
